content:
Trying to figure out config URLs and names for IG publisher for this IG proposal:
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Da_Vinci_PDex-formulary_FHIR_IG_Proposal

The "proposed IG realm and code" is US/Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary.

Package name: ( http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_NPM_Package_Spec)

We plan to use: hl7.fhir.us.usdf (US Drug Formulary)

URLs (http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=IG_Publisher_Documentation#URLs)

We plan to use the following as the canonical URL:
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary/

ImplementationGuide URL:
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary/ImplementationGuide

Please comment/correct.

Thanks,
Saul

if this is what FMG approved: US/Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary, then your canonical URL is http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary and your package id is hl7.fhir.us.Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary. You have no choice about this except to consult FMG
I'm personally surprised that FMG approved that
I recall that we (FMG) consistently requested that the canonical URI be changed. I think we asked that "PDex-" be removed as it was not adding value above Davinci-
but if it says otherwise... it's back to FMG
need to check the minutes. I don't recall case discussion

need to check the minutes. I don't recall case discussion

If I need to know tomorrow, I should go with http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary and hl7.fhir.us.Davinci-PDex-drug-formulary. right?

I assume appeal to higher powers (FMG) takes time....

Thanks @Grahame Grieve and @John Moehrke for your quick response.
@Anne Wizauer can you check the FMG minutes for this one?
Saul, you should definitely remove the "PDex-" We just don't recall the case of "Davinci-"
